short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: OctoPr inlines a GitHub issue's pull request references, so you never have to go digging through an issue thread to find them again!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Inline pull request references are currently available in:
• The issue side panel view on project boards
• Issue hover cards on any repo's issues page
